service.title: URI Fragment Identifiers for the text/csv Media Type
service.documentation: This memo defines URI fragment identifiers for text/csv MIME entities. These fragment identifiers make it possible to refer to parts of a text/csv MIME entity identified by row, column, or cell. Fragment identification can use single items or ranges.

media-type.documentation: This memo updates the text/csv media type defined in RFC 4180 by defining URI fragment identifiers for text/csv MIME entities.
